# CLError.Code.deferredAccuracyTooLow

**Case**

A constant that indicates deferred mode isn’t supported for the requested accuracy.

## Declaration

```swift
case deferredAccuracyTooLow
```

## Discussion

The accuracy must be set to [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/kCLLocationAccuracyBest] or [doc://com.apple.corelocation/documentation/CoreLocation/kCLLocationAccuracyBestForNavigation].

## Getting deferred location update errors

- **CLError.Code.deferredFailed**: A constant that indicates the location manager didn’t enter deferred mode for an unknown reason.
- **CLError.Code.deferredCanceled**: A constant that indicates your app or the location manager canceled the request for deferred updates.
- **CLError.Code.deferredDistanceFiltered**: A constant that indicates deferred mode doesn’t support distance filters.
- **CLError.Code.deferredNotUpdatingLocation**: A constant that indicates the location manager didn’t enter deferred mode because location updates were already disabled or paused.
